title: 172 - Faith, Doubt, and the Beauty of Uncertainty  - with Austin Fischer
description:
Austin Fischer, author of "Faith in the Shadows: Finding Christ in the Midst of Doubt," joins the show! His book is an excellent resource for people wondering how to be faithful in the midst of their doubts.

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com

Subscribe on iTunes - apple.co/1Lla1Nj

www.patreon.com/voxpodcast
